summary: Project FORGEPLUGINS in JIRA should have the same notification scheme as project FORGE
description:
As for now, it is not possible to receive updates about the FORGEPLUGINS project.

The same notification scheme set for 
https://issues.jboss.org/plugins/servlet/project-config/FORGE/notifications should be used in https://issues.jboss.org/plugins/servlet/project-config/FORGEPLUGINS/notifications
